title: NWFL : Edo Queens will deliver against Ekiti Queens - Odiagbe
body_text:
Sport
NWFL: Edo Queens will deliver against Ekiti Queens – Odiagbe
Edo Queens midfielder, Deborah Odiagbe, has promised that they are ready to deliver in the clash against Ekiti Queens.
The former Nigeria Women Football League, NWFL, champions secured a hard fought win over Heartland Queens in their last game in Benin-City.
Odiagbe admitted the team’s struggles in their last match but assured they want to improve on their performance against Ekiti Queens.
Edo Queens will square up with Ekiti Queens at the Oluyemi Kayode stadium in Ado Ekiti on Wednesday.
“We are ready to deliver in this grudge match-no excuses,” Odiagbe stated in a pre-match interview.
“We didn’t do enough at home against Heartland Queens, we are in Ekiti to get something.”
